```{ojs}
//| echo: false
starknetjs = import("https://jspm.dev/starknet")
get_starknet = import("https://jspm.dev/get-starknet")
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
mutable wallet = null;
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
async function connectWallet(e)  {
   var wall =  await get_starknet.connect();
   await wall.enable();
   mutable wallet = wall;
   }
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
async function enableWallet(e)  {
   await wallet.enable();
   }
```

# Incredible Wallet Button
```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof connect = Inputs.button([
  ["connect", connectWallet],
], {value: 0, label: "wallet thing"})
```



```{ojs}
contract = {
wallet;
var abi = await FileAttachment("example.json").json()
console.log(abi);
return (new starknetjs.Contract(abi, "0x036486801b8f42e950824cba55b2df8cccb0af2497992f807a7e1d9abd2c6ba1", wallet.account))

}
```

```{ojs}
count = contract.counter()
```

```{ojs}
md`${count} is the count`
```
